INCIDENT REPORT ALPHA 001

Skip Gate Down

Objective

Following disruption to Skip Gate Alpspitze (lesser-class blink gate), ALPHA team was deployed to investigate and restore operational status.

Summary

ALPHA team deployed via unmanned dropship to the structure’s surface and initiated uplink from the primary black-box telemetry store.

Telemetry indicates interference consistent with GOI ████████████. Hostile frames were engaged and neutralized during the operation, resulting in minor secondary damage to Alpspitze.

Outcome

Skip Gate access restored. Sustained damage limits jump-window tolerance. Repairs are ongoing.

Personnel

  • Pilot: Romeo
    STATUS: Unwounded

  • Pilot: Val
    STATUS: Wounded (cosmetic)

  • Pilot: Karl
    STATUS: Wounded (augmentics required)

Assets

  • CALLSIGN: HAWK-3
    TYPE: IPS-N BLACKBEARD
    STATUS: Operational (moderate damage)

  • CALLSIGN: MIRAGE-1
    TYPE: SSC METALMARK
    STATUS: Disabled (reactor breach)

  • CALLSIGN: BULLWARK-2
    TYPE: IPS-N DRAKE
    STATUS: ████████████████████████████

Assessment

Overall, ALPHA team performance is acceptable. While minor, damage to Alpspitze could have been avoided; personnel are remanded to secondary training for corrective review.

Continue to monitor GOI ████████████ activity for further disturbances.
